arg.g: The Foreign Ministry on the U.S.
the authenticity of tapes recorded by Kuchma's body guard two years ago and in it the Ukrainian president agrees to sell the performance system to Iraq

example.arg: من صحة أشرطة سجلها الحارس الشخصي لكوتشما ميكولا ميلنيتشينكو

arg.g: between Israel on the one side and between Syria and Lebanon on the other side
